text: Hey ya’ll! We have a <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Now-Live-Exclusive-CMS-Hub-AMA-Nov-16/td-p/386416|CMS Hub AMA> happening this week on the Community.  Some smart folks from HubSpot will be answering your questions.
Struggling to get `hs upload` to work… I keep getting the following error: `[ERROR] `src` is a module path but `dest` is not.`
Trying to run `hs upload --portal=<portalname> folder/modules/module-name.module folder/modules`
Never mind, figured out `dest` needs to be the same as `src`
